original_title: Sysco LABS launches its ‘Mentor Mash’ growth and experience-sharing program
original_body_lines: Sysco LABS officially unveiled ‘Mentor Mash’, its inaugural mentorship program for colleagues, reinforcing the company’s dedication to nurture talent and foster professional growth. The initiative, unveiled on January 31st, marks a significant milestone in Sysco LABS’ talent development strategy, ensuring greater sharing of experiences and knowledge between mentors and mentees.
